page.title: 05TUTT HILL (1)
page.content:
Tutt Hill takes it's name from the high ground on which it stands, it is a collection of dwelling houses set between the Ashford/London railway line and the A20 Trunk road which dominates the square.
The M20 Motor-way extention will add to the isolation of the area which is flat low level grassland. Tutt Hill is the place where the Motor-way will change direction from N.W. to W. and also provides the main access to a section of Motor-way works.
Construction of the bridge to carry the railway over the Motor-way here is in progress, this will cause disruption and noise at least until the early 1990s.
